entries.title: Federal safety regulators will look at 'potential hazards' linked to gas stoves
entries.description: Federal safety regulators said Tuesday that they plan later this year to begin gathering "data and perspectives" on the "potential hazards associated with gas stoves"

entries.title: Constantine, the former and last king of Greece, dies at 82
entries.description: The former King of Greece, Constantine, has died in a hospital in Athens

entries.title: 10-month sentence imposed for cryptocurrency insider trading
entries.description: Prosecutors say it's the first insider trading case involving cryptocurrency.

entries.title: DeSantis reups Florida environment pledge made 4 years ago
entries.description: The Florida Republican is reaffirming a commitment to clean water.

entries.title: Federal COVID aid OK'd to pay for roads, natural disasters
entries.description: States and local governments soon will have new flexibility to spend billions of dollars of federal coronavirus relief funds on some things not directly related to the pandemic

entries.title: Articles of impeachment introduced against DHS Secretary Mayorkas by Texas Republican
entries.description: Rep. Pat Fallon initially filed a resolution on Jan. 3, the first day of the new Congress, to impeach Alejandro Mayorkas

entries.title: Longtime Trump Organization CFO Allen Weisselberg sentenced to 5 months in jail
entries.description: Allen Weisselberg, the longtime CFO of Donald Trump's namesake company, was sentenced Tuesday to five months in jail for evading more than $1.7 million in taxes.

entries.title: WATCH:  Golfers flee as huge wave hits California golf course
entries.description: A huge wave at a golf course along California’s coast sent golfers running inland and swamped their golf carts.

entries.title: WATCH:  Snowboarder caught in Utah avalanche
entries.description: Footage captures the moment a snowboarder got caught in an avalanche on Kessler Peak in Utah’s Big Cottonwood Canyon, sliding an estimated 300 feet before he was able to come to a stop.

entries.title: Head of Florida Democrats resigns after disastrous midterms
entries.description: The head of the Florida Democratic Party has resigned after a disastrous midterm election in the onetime battleground state

entries.title: How does the Biden classified documents matter compare to Trump's?
entries.description: How does the Biden classified documents matter compare to Trump's?

entries.title: Club Q owner reveals future of bar following Colorado Springs shooting
entries.description: Club Q co-owner Matthew Haynes is planning to rebuild and renovate Club Q with a memorial dedicated to those affected by the Colorado Springs shooting.

entries.title: California Rep. Katie Porter announces 2024 Senate bid
entries.description: California Democrat Rep. Katie Porter announced on Tuesday on Twitter that she will seek Sen. Dianne Feinstein's Senate seat in 2024.

entries.title: World Bank: Recession a looming threat for global economy
entries.description: The World Bank warns the global economy will come “perilously close” to a recession this year, led by weaker growth in the world’s top economies — the United States, Europe and China

entries.title: Mega Millions reaches 3rd-largest jackpot in history
entries.description: The drawing for Tuesday's $1.1 billion Mega Millions jackpot takes place at 11 p.m.

entries.title: George Santos expected to be target of ethics complaint by New York Democrats
entries.description: New York Republican Rep. George Santos is expected to be target of ethics complaint by New York Democrats.

entries.title: Mom fatally shoots home invader to protect her 2 kids: Sheriff
entries.description: A Louisiana mom fatally shot a home invader to protect her two young children, according to authorities.

entries.title: Ethiopians abroad celebrate Christmas with hope and angst after November cease-fire
entries.description: Ethiopian Christmas, or Ganna, is celebrated on Jan. 7 by the Ethiopian Orthodox Church and is a special time for Ethiopians at home and in the diaspora.

entries.title: Another round of Coinbase job cuts, 20% of workforce let go
entries.description: Coinbase is cutting approximately 20% of its workforce, or about 950 jobs, in a second round of layoffs in less than a year

entries.title: US Navy says it seized Iran assault rifles bound for Yemen
entries.description: The U.S. Navy has seized over 2,100 assault rifles from a ship in the Gulf of Oman it believes came from Iran and were bound for Yemen’s Iran-backed Houthi rebels

entries.title: NATO chief confident Nordic pair will join despite holdups
entries.description: NATO Secretary-General Jens Stoltenberg says he's confident that Finland and Sweden will join the military alliance

entries.title: UK space industry mulls setback after satellite launch fails
entries.description: British officials and space scientists say they are disappointed but not deterred after the first attempt to launch satellites into orbit from the U.K. ended in failure

entries.title: California storms live updates: 1920,000 without power as severe weather pounds state
entries.description: Live updates on the deadly and destructive storms in California.

entries.title: Andrew Tate in Romanian court to appeal detention
entries.description: The divisive social media personality Andrew Tate has arrived at a court in Romania in handcuffs to appeal against a judge’s earlier decision to extend his arrest period from 24 hours to 30 days on charges of being part of an organized crime group, hum...

entries.title: 5 dead after man shoots and kills wife and 3 children: Police
entries.description: Five people are dead, including the alleged suspect, after a man shot and killed his wife and three children before turning the gun on himself, police say.

entries.title: China suspends visas for South Koreans in virus retaliation
entries.description: China is suspending visas for South Koreans to come to the country for tourism or business in apparent retaliation for COVID-19-related requirements on Chinese travelers

entries.title: 12-year-old girl stabs 9-year-old brother to death, police say
entries.description: A 12-year-old girl has been arrested after stabbing her 9-year-old brother to death, police said.

entries.title: Birth control ruling to see fresh scrutiny at Texas Capitol
entries.description: Texas lawmakers are returning to the Capitol for the first legislative session since a statewide abortion ban took effect, and access to birth control for minors is likely to command fresh attention

entries.title: Nygren to be sworn in as next Navajo Nation president
entries.description: Buu Nygren will be sworn in Tuesday as the next president of the vast Navajo Nation

entries.title: California towns evacuated as monster storm expected to bring foot of rain
entries.description: Another "powerful" atmospheric river has struck the West Coast in the coming hours and days, drenching a drought-ravaged region.

entries.title: House Republicans pass legislation trying to block new IRS funding
entries.description: House Republicans are poised on Monday night to make good on a campaign promise by approving a bill that would zero-out IRS funding from the Inflation Reduction Act

entries.title: Bipartisan group of senators renew call for immigration reform during border trip
entries.description: A bipartisan group of senators on Monday visited the border in El Paso, Texas, as they work to craft an elusive legislative response to the ongoing surge of migrants

entries.title: Teen accused of breaking into cars is shot, killed
entries.description: A Washington, D.C., man fatally shot a teenage boy on Saturday, whom he said was breaking into vehicles in his neighborhood, according to police.

entries.title: Promotions, not job cuts, follow Southwest's holiday chaos
entries.description: Southwest Airlines is making a number of executive promotions, but nobody is getting fired after thousands of flights were canceled in late December

entries.title: 7.6 quake damages buildings in Indonesia, felt in Australia
entries.description: A powerful deep-sea earthquake has damaged village buildings in a lightly populated island chain in eastern Indonesia

entries.title: What the House Republicans' new rules change, from speaker power to spending
entries.description: The new House rules mark a sharp change in procedure on Capitol Hill, where Democrats have been in control for the last two years

entries.title: After McCarthy's deal to become speaker, House GOP takes up new rules
entries.description: The House on Monday night passed the Republican majority's rules to govern the chamber for the next two years: The total was 220-213
